item.description:
JOYFUL NOISE GOSPEL CONCERT
WITH THE HARLEM GOSPEL CHOIR

SATURDAY, JANUARY 16, AT 7:30PM At Harvard University's Sanders Theater

Presented by Cambridge Multicultural Arts Center
Location: Sanders Theatre
Memorial Hall, 45 Quincy Street, Cambridge



Our annual gospel concert celebrating the life and legacy of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. has become a "must see" for Bostonians and Cantabrigians alike! We sell out each year - so get your tickets now!

SAT, January 16, 7:30 PM
Joyful Noise (Gospel)

With the Harlem Gospel Choir
Honoring the Life and Legacy of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
Harvard University's Sanders Theater

45 Quincy Street, Cambridge, MA
www.cmacusa.org


Date/Time: Saturday 1/16 07:30 PM Add to iCal | Buy Online
Ticket Prices: Regular: $22, Students: $16 with valid ID, Seniors: $16, Children 12 years and younger: $12, Multicultural Arts Center members: $18, Outings & Innings: $18
item.name: JOYFUL NOISE GOSPEL CONCERT WITH THE HARLEM GOSPEL CHOIR
